00180 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00181 {
00182     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00183 
00184     if ( globalThresholdingTime_.get() != 0 )
00185         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_.get();
00186 
00187     if ( templateFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00188         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_.get();
00189 
00190     if ( averagingFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00191         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_.get();
00192 
00193     if ( thinningTime_.get() != 0 )
00194         totalTime_ += *thinningTime_.get();
00195 
00196     if ( regionsExtractionTime_.get() != 0 )
00197         totalTime_ += *regionsExtractionTime_.get();
00198 
00199     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_.get() != 0 )
00200         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_.get();
00201 
00202     if ( spacesLocationFindingTime_.get() != 0 )
00203         totalTime_ += *spacesLocationFindingTime_.get();
00204 };
